import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" const InvoiceInfo = ({ props }) => { const [data, setData] = useState() const handleDelete = async (_id) => { await axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/${_id}`, { params: { id: _id } }).then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/${props._id}`) .then((res) => setData(res)) .then((data) => console.log(data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }) return (
Go Back
Status: PENDING

{data._id}

Invoice Date Jun 3, 2022
Bill to: {data.clientName}
Sent To: john@johnkomarci.com
Payment Date: Aug 2, 2022
  • 123 Testing ville
  • Detroit
  • 54299
  • USA
Item Name Quantity Price Total
Pentest 1 Germanay Germanaay
Francisco Chang 1 Francisco Chang 200
200 1 200 200
Amount Due: $799.48
) } export default InvoiceInfo
